title:
Which one is better?
B.ed with ma or B.ed after completing ma? - Quora

response.answer_text: Persuing B.Ed before M.A is much better than doing it afterwards as if you have doneB.ed before then can apply for the various exams under TGT level and if you do it after completing a M.A then those chances of filling the exams could be lost and you will have to wait for long to get the job. Hope this is helpful.
Hello, it is better to B.ed with M.A in distance mode because then you will be eligible as a PGT teacher.
